function.name: addnoise
function.description: Returns matrix M with added noise, where the noise has probabilty p/2 to add n to a pixel, and p/2 to subtract n.

function.name: and
function.description: Returns the boolean AND of two image matrices M and N, which must be the same size.

function.name: augment3
function.description: Returns a matrix formed by putting matrices (or vectors) X, Y, and Z side by side. They must all have the same number of rows.

function.name: binarize
function.description: Returns a binarized version of matrix M with pixels above threshold thresh set to 1 and below to 0.

function.name: binarize2
function.description: Returns a binarized version of matrix M with pixels between lowThresh and highThresh set to inValue, and pixels outside to outValue.

function.name: binarize_auto
function.description: Returns a binarized version of matrix M, choosing the threshold automatically.

function.name: blend
function.description: Returns a blend of same-size matrices M and N (pixelwise sum - [product/255]).

function.name: canny
function.description: Returns a binary edge image resulting from Canny edge detection on matrix M, using standard deviation sigma and hysteresis thresholds low and high.

function.name: center
function.description: Returns fourier transform image matrix M tansformed so that DC is in the center.

function.name: centsmooth
function.description: Returns matrix M smoothed with a 3x3 center weighted kernel.

function.name: clip
function.description: Returns matrix M with elements clipped to lie between Min and Max.

function.name: close
function.description: Performs binary closing on matrix M at threshold b with structuring element Melem.

function.name: cnvxhull
function.description: Returns a matrix containing the convex hull of pixels of value fg in matrix M.

function.name: colgrad
function.description: Returns the column gradient (difference by columns) of matrix M.

function.name: compgrad
function.description: Performs edge detection by comparing the gradients of the 8 neighbors on matrix M.

function.name: concomp
function.description: Performs connected component labeling of the pixels with grayscale value fg in matrix M, considering 4-connected neighbors if con is 4 or 8-connected if con is 8.

function.name: convol2d
function.description: Returns the convolution of matrix M with kernel K.

function.name: convolve3
function.description: Returns the quick convolution of matrix M with 3x3 kernel K.

function.name: convolve5
function.description: Returns the quick convolution of matrix M with 5x5 kernel K.

function.name: dct2d
function.description: Returns the 2D discrete cosine transform (type II) of matrix M.

function.name: diacrisp
function.description: Returns matrix M crisped with a 3x3 diagonally weighted kernel.

function.name: difedge
function.description: Performs edge-detection by differential convolution on matrix M.

function.name: dilate
function.description: Performs binary dilation on matrix M at threshold b using structuring element Melem with origin at row r_origin and column c_origin.

function.name: dilate4
function.description: Performs dilation on matrix M at threshold b using 4 neighbors.

function.name: dilate8
function.description: Performs dilation on matrix M at threshold b using 8 neighbors.

function.name: distform
function.description: Returns the distance transform of image M using foreground gray value fg.

function.name: equalize
function.description: Returns matrix M with grayscale adjusted to form a linear cumulative histogram.

function.name: erode
function.description: Performs binary erosion on matrix M at threshold b using structuring element Melem with origin at row r_origin and column c_origin.

function.name: erode4
function.description: Performs erosion on matrix M at threshold b using 4 neighbors.

function.name: erode8
function.description: Performs erosion on matrix M at threshold b using 8 neighbors.

function.name: extract
function.description: Returns the nth (1, 2, or 3) color component of packed 3-color matrix M.

function.name: freichen
function.description: Performs edge detection by Frei-Chen convolution on matrix M.

function.name: funcdeconv
function.description: Deconvolution of matrix M with frequency domain function f and error e.

function.name: funconv
function.description: Convolution of matrix M with frequency domain function f.

function.name: funmap
function.description: Returns matrix M with function f applied to each element.

function.name: gaussconv
function.description: Convolution of matrix M with frequency domain gaussian of half-width s.

function.name: gaussdeconv
function.description: Deconvolution of matrix M with frequency domain gaussian of half-width s with error e.

function.name: getnoise
function.description: Returns the difference between matrix M and median filtered M.

function.name: gray_to_rgb
function.description: Returns grayscale matrix gray converted to color using color palette matrix colormap.

function.name: gray_close
function.description: Performs grayscale closing on matrix M with structuring element Melem.

function.name: gray_dilate
function.description: Performs grayscale dilation on matrix M using structuring element Melem with origin at row r_origin and column c_origin.

function.name: gray_erode
function.description: Performs grayscale erosion on matrix M using structuring element Melem with origin at row r_origin and column c_origin.

function.name: gray_open
function.description: Performs grayscale opening on matrix M with structuring element Melem.

function.name: hist2d
function.description: Returns a two-dimensional histogram with n bins on equal-sized matrices M and N.

function.name: hls_to_rgb
function.description: Returns array HLS in HLS color representation converted to RGB color representation.

function.name: horzflip
function.description: Returns the matrix M flipped horizontally.

function.name: hsv_to_rgb
function.description: Returns array HSV in HSV color representation converted to RGB color representation.

function.name: idct2d
function.description: Returns the inverse 2D discrete cosine transform (type II) of matrix M.

function.name: imhist
function.description: Returns an n-bin histogram of M for values between 0 and 255 (ignores values outside that range).

function.name: imhist2
function.description: Returns an n-bin histogram of M over its range of values.

function.name: immse
function.description: Returns the mean-squared-error (MSE) between image matrices M and Q.

function.name: imquant
function.description: Returns a quantized version of matrix M containing only n equally-spaced grayscale levels between 0 and 255.

function.name: imquant2
function.description: Returns a quantized version of matrix M containing only the grayscale levels in vector v.

function.name: imsnr
function.description: Returns the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) between image matrices M and Q.

function.name: invert
function.description: Returns the matrix M with each element set to 255 - element.

function.name: invert2
function.description: Returns the matrix M with each element set to max(M) - element + min(M).

function.name: iwave2d
function.description: The n-level inverse wavelet transform of M.

function.name: kirsch
function.description: Performs edge detection by kirsch convolution and comparison on matrix M.

function.name: laplace4
function.description: Returns the convolution of matrix M with a 3x3 Laplacian kernel. The kernel's center is 4.

function.name: laplace8
function.description: Returns the convolution of matrix M with a 3x3 Laplacian kernel. The kernel's center is 8.

function.name: laplace24
function.description: Returns the convolution of matrix M with a 5x5 Laplacian kernel. The kernel's center is 24.

function.name: levelmap
function.description: Returns matrix with values in vec assigned by matching vec's indices to elements in matrix M. vec must be such that the elements of M are between 0 and length(vec) - 1.

function.name: mask
function.description: Returns matrix M masked by same-size matrix N (i.e. with zeros where N is zero).

function.name: matconv
function.description: Convolution of matrix M with frequency domain mask N.

function.name: matdeconv
function.description: Deconvolution of matrix M with frequency domain mask N and error e.

function.name: medfilt
function.description: Returns median filtered M.

function.name: moment_invariant
function.description: Returns a vector containing the seven typical moment invariants of M.

function.name: open
function.description: Performs binary opening on matrix M at threshold b using structuring element Melem.

function.name: or
function.description: Returns boolean OR of two image matrices M and N, which must be the same size.

function.name: orthocrisp
function.description: Returns matrix M crisped with a 3x3 orthogonally weighted kernel.

function.name: orthocrisp5
function.description: Returns matrix M crisped with a 5x5 orthogonally weighted kernel.

function.name: orthosmooth
function.description: Returns matrix M smoothed with a 3x3 orthogonally weighted kernel.

function.name: orthosmooth5
function.description: Returns matrix M smoothed with a 5x5 orthogonally weighted kernel.

function.name: prewitt
function.description: Performs edge detection by Prewitt convolution on matrix M.

function.name: putregion
function.description: Returns the matrix N inserted into M at row row and column col.

function.name: quantfilt
function.description: Performs quantile filtering on M using neighborhood matrix elem and quantile probability quantile.

function.name: READRAW
function.params: filename, rows, cols, bits, endian, skip
function.description: Returns the contents of a raw binary image file as a matrix. The binary file is interpreted to contain a rows x cols matrix of bits (8 or 16) bits per pixel packed integers, in "Little" or "Big" endian format, and skip bytes are skipped for header at the beginning of the file.

function.name: reg_grow
function.description: Performs the piecewise-constant energy-based region growing segmentation of M into num_regions regions, using initial grid spaced by x_gridsize along x and y_gridsize along y.

function.name: relerror
function.description: Returns the relative error between matrices M and Q.

function.name: replace
function.description: Returns packed image matrix M with the nth (1, 2, or 3) color component replaced by matrix N, which must have the same number of rows as M and 1/3 as many columns.

function.name: rgb_to_gray
function.description: Returns RGB color array RGB converted to grayscale.

function.name: rgb_to_hls
function.description: Returns array RGB in RGB color representation converted to HLS color representation.

function.name: rgb_to_hsv
function.description: Returns array RGB in RGB color representation converted to HSV color representation.

function.name: rgb_to_ycbcr
function.description: Returns array RGB in RGB color representation converted to YCbCr color representation.

function.name: rgb_to_yiq
function.description: Returns array RGB in RGB color representation converted to YIQ color representation.

function.name: roberts
function.description: Performs edge detection by Roberts convolution on matrix M.

function.name: robinson3
function.description: Performs edge detection by 3x3 Robinson convolution and comparison on matrix M.

function.name: robinson5
function.description: Performs edge detection by 5x5 Robinson convolution and comparison on matrix M.

function.name: rotate
function.description: Returns the matrix M rotated angle degrees counterclockwise.

function.name: rotate180
function.description: Returns the matrix M rotated 180 degrees counterclockwise.

function.name: rotate90
function.description: Returns the matrix M rotated 90 degrees counterclockwise.

function.name: rotate270
function.description: Returns the matrix M rotated 270 degrees counterclockwise.

function.name: rowgrad
function.description: Returns the row gradient (difference by rows) of matrix M.

function.name: scale
function.description: Returns matrix M with elements scaled between Min and Max.

function.name: shape_features
function.description: Returns a matrix of moments and shape features for each distinct pixel value in labeled image M.

function.name: skeleton
function.description: Returns binary matrix B eroded to its innermost level.

function.name: skeleton2
function.description: Returns the skeleton of matrix M binarized with threshold b.

function.name: sobel
function.description: Performs edge detection by Sobel convolution on matrix M.

function.name: subcolor
function.description: Returns the submatrix from row ir to jr, column ic to jc, of packed color matrix M.

function.name: thin
function.description: Returns the thinned version of matrix M binarized with threshold b.

function.name: threshold
function.description: Returns the matrix M with every element below thresh set to thresh. If thresh is negative, every element above -thresh is set to -thresh.

function.name: translate
function.description: Returns matrix M translated by rows rows and cols colums, padding unfilled matrix elements with pad.

function.name: unicrisp
function.description: Returns matrix M crisped with a 3x3 uniformly weighted kernel.

function.name: unismooth
function.description: Returns matrix M smoothed with a 3x3 uniformly weighted kernel.

function.name: unismooth5
function.description: Returns matrix M smoothed with a 5x5 uniformly weighted kernel.

function.name: vertflip
function.description: Returns the matrix M flipped vertically.

function.name: warp
function.description: Performs bilinear warping on matrix M, using tie-points stored in matrix T.

function.name: wave2d
function.description: The n-level wavelet tranform of M.

function.name: wavescale
function.description: The n-level wavelet transform of M, scaled between Min and Max.

function.name: wiener2d
function.description: Perform 2D adaptive Wiener filtering on M using a local window win_w pixels wide by win_h pixels high.

function.name: WRITERAW
function.description: Writes a matrix M to raw binary integer image file filename, using either 8 or 16 bits per pixel, in "Little" or "Big" endian storage order. Set this function equal to the matrix M.

function.name: ycbcr_to_rgb
function.description: Returns array YCbCr in YCbCr color representation converted to RGB color representation.

function.name: yiq_to_rgb
function.description: Returns array YIQ in YIQ color representation converted to RGB color representation.

function.name: zoom
function.description: Return image matrix M resized by factor hscale horizontally and vscale vertically.
